title: Better Than Ever: 2021 Year In Review
description: This year wasn't just better — it was better than ever! Join us as we look back at some of our favorite sermons from Pastor Steven and Holly and our favorite moments from 2021.
dc:creator: Elevation Church
itunes:summary: This year wasn't just better — it was better than ever! Join us as we look back at some of our favorite sermons from Pastor Steven and Holly and our favorite moments from 2021.
